dialogue.htmlContent:
The tunnels of Submission have an ominous feel to them at the best of times, but as you and [npc.name] make your way down the dirty, deserted passageways, you're filled with a particular sense of dread, as though something terrible is about to happen.

At first, the sinister silence that permeates these gloomy catacombs is broken only by the rustling of litter that you and your partner disturb underfoot, but as you travel ever onwards, you start hearing faint sounds of movement coming from somewhere far behind you. Realising that you're being followed, and not wanting to be inadvertently shepherded into a trap that might be lying up ahead, you stand your ground and turn to face the direction of your pursuers.

[npc.speech(Imps...)] [npc.Name] whispers, and after just a moment, [npc.sheIs] proven right, as from around the far corner, there appear the forms of four imps. Two of these are larger than the others, and, although their wings look large enough to sustain flight, they're choosing to walk upon the ground, while the other two, smaller imps, are fluttering along in the air a short way behind.

All four of the imps are dressed in skimpy rags, and, perhaps due to the fact that they appear more comfortable flying around than walking, you notice that the two smaller imps lack any form of footwear. What catches your attention the most, however, is that the two larger imps are armed. One of them is carrying a length of metal pipe and a crude wooden shield, while the other appears to be carrying an enchanted shortbow.

As they catch sight of the two of you, the alpha-imps stop in their tracks. The one on the #IF(RND.nextInt(2)==0) left, #ELSE right, #ENDIF armed with the pipe and shield, appears to be the leader, and [npc2.she] steps forwards and sizes you and [npc.name] up, before declaring, [npc2.speech(Yer a pair of cheeky [pc.insultPlural], ain't yer?! Runnin' round in our territory, thinkin' ya ain't gonna get caught!)]

The two smaller imps flutter forwards to back their leader up, and [npc4.name] sneers, [npc4.speech([pc.InsultPlural]! You're gonna be in for it now!)]

Taking this opportunity to throw [npc5.her] own insult your way, [npc5.name] cruelly spits, [npc5.speech(That's right, [pc.insultPlural]! You two ready to be our fuck-toys?! I'm gonna love hearin' you both squeal!)]

It's quite clear that these imps are only interested in one thing, and as they start to advance, the second alpha-imp, who up until now had been quite content to simply sneer and scowl at the two of you, puts any doubts as to their intentions to rest, as [npc3.she] calls out, #IF properties.getForcedTFTendency()==FORCED_TF_FEMININE || properties.getForcedTFTendency()==FORCED_TF_FEMININE_HEAVY #THEN [npc3.speech(The boss gave us some potions to use on cheeky little [pc.insultPlural] like you two! Gonna turn you both into our big-titty futa fuck-toys, so when we're usin' your cunts as our cock-sleeves, we can 'ave a laugh when we get you to cum all over the floor!)] #ELSE [npc3.speech(The boss gave us some potions to use on cheeky little [pc.insultPlural] like you two! Gonna give you both a nice wet cunt to use as our cock-sleeves, an' a little cock so we can 'ave a laugh when we get you to cum all over the floor!)] #ENDIF

Cowed by the imps' cruel insults and aggressive posturing, you decide that the best course of action would be to just give the gang what they want. Not wanting [npc.name] to have to endure this as well, you tell [npc.herHim] to step back, before holding up your [pc.hands] as you submit to the imps. [pc.speech(Please, there's no need for violence. You just want sex with me, right?)]

[npc2.speech(Good, ya know yer place, [pc.insult]!)] [npc2.name] snarls, before turning [npc2.her] head and harshly ordering [npc2.her] subordinates to subdue you, [npc2.speech(Get [pc.herHim] down, ya useless fucks!)]

The two smaller imps immediately dart forwards, and, flying up to each side of you, they grab your [pc.arms], before folding their wings behind their backs and using their weight to pull you down onto your knees. As you hit the floor, you look up to see the two alpha-imps stepping forwards, grinning in delight as they see that you're not going to put up a fight.

[npc.speech([npc.PcName]... Are you sure about this?!)] [npc.Name] calls out from somewhere behind you, but you turn and reassure [npc.herHim] that this is the for the best, before focusing your attention on the imps.

#IF pc.isAbleToAccessCoverableArea(CA_MOUTH, true) #THEN

[npc2.speech(Gimme the potion,)] [npc2.name] snaps at [npc2.her] partner. Quickly producing a bottle of strange liquid, [npc3.name] hands it over to her superior, who immediately pulls the stopper out and steps forwards, before grabbing your chin and squeezing your cheeks. #IF properties.getForcedTFTendency()==FORCED_TF_FEMININE || properties.getForcedTFTendency()==FORCED_TF_FEMININE_HEAVY #THEN [npc2.speech(Open wide, [pc.insult]! This'll turn yer into a stacked futa, so we can watch yer cum all over the floor as we're poundin' yer cunt!)] #ELSE [npc2.speech(Open wide, [pc.insult]! This'll give yer a cunt an' cock, so we can watch yer cum all over the floor as we're fuckin' yer pussy!)] #ENDIF

With no further warning, and not even giving you time to do as [npc2.she] commands, [npc2.name] shoves the bottle past your [pc.lips], and you feel the warm, sickly-sweet liquid entering your mouth...

#ELSE

[npc2.speech(This stupid [pc.insult]'s got [pc.her] mouth blocked! Fucking [pc.insult]!)] [npc2.name] spits in disgust. Turning to [npc2.her] subordinate, [npc2.she] snaps, [npc2.speech(Save that potion for the next one we catch! Let's just fuck whatever holes we can with this [pc.insult].)]

With no further warning, [npc2.name] reaches forwards and grabs the back of your head, before pushing you down onto all fours. [npc2.speech(Get down, [pc.insult]! Time to be a good fuck-toy for us!)]

#ENDIF

Realising that these imps aren't going to be satisfied with anything other than sex, you turn towards your companion, [npc.name], and say, [pc.speech(You're going to have to give the imps what they want. We're not going to get out of this until they're satisfied, so just tell them they can fuck you, and try to have fun, ok?)]

#IFnpc.isAttractedTo(npc2) || !game.isNonConEnabled() #THEN[npc.speech(Sure thing, [pc.name],)] [npc.name] replies. [npc.speech(If that's really what you want me to do...)] #ELSE[npc.speech([pc.Name]! W-What the hell?!)] [npc.name] replies in alarm. [npc.speech(I-I really don't want to do that!)] #ENDIF

Having overheard your conversation, [npc2.name] steps forwards, before sneering, [npc2.speech(Hah! Well, we're not too demandin' or anything. So long as we can avoid a fight, just one cock-sleeve will do!)]

#IFnpc.isAttractedTo(npc2) || !game.isNonConEnabled() #THEN

[npc.Name] steps forwards, smiling at the imps as [npc.she] does as you've instructed. [npc.speech(All four of you want me at once, huh? Well, come on then...)]

[npc2.speech(So, this [npc.insult] knows [npc.her] place!)] [npc2.name] snarls, before turning [npc2.her] head and harshly ordering [npc2.her] subordinates to subdue [npc.name], [npc2.speech(Get [npc.herHim] down, ya useless fucks!)]

#ELSE

[npc.Name] steps back, clearly nervous about what's about to happen. [npc.speech(A-All four of you? At once? I-I don't know...)]

[npc2.speech(So, this [npc.insult] still needs to be shown [npc.her] place, huh?!)] [npc2.name] snarls, before turning [npc2.her] head and harshly ordering [npc2.her] subordinates to subdue [npc.name], [npc2.speech(Get [npc.herHim] down, ya useless fucks, before [npc.she] tries to run!)]

#ENDIF

The two smaller imps immediately dart forwards, and, flying up to each side of [npc.name], they grab [npc.her] [npc.arms], before folding their wings behind their backs and using their weight to pull [npc.herHim] down onto [npc.her] knees. As [npc.she] hits the floor, [npc.she] looks up to see the two alpha-imps stepping forwards, grinning in anticipation of what's about to happen.

Although happy enough to give [npc.her] body over to the imps, you don't want to see [npc.name] being transformed, so as [npc2.name] shoves the bottle into [npc.her] mouth, you call out, [pc.speech(Don't drink it, [npc.name]! Don't let them change you!)]
